Shields of the Eladrin Host.name: Shields of the Eladrin Host
Shields of the Eladrin Host.fullText:
Feyliege Utility 26Shields of the Eladrin Host

Spectral eladrin knights spring from all sides, protecting you and your allies from danger, transporting all of you to safety, and then disappear back into the Feywild.

Encounter        Arcane, Teleportation
Immediate Interrupt      Close burst 5

Trigger: An attack hits you or an ally within 5 squares of you

Target: You and each ally in the burst

Effect: Each target gains a +4 bonus to AC and Reflex until the end of his or her next turn. After the triggering attack is resolved, any target can swap positions with another target.


Published in Arcane Power, page(s) 145.
